description: Harness the power of runes to cast a wide array of spells for combat, utility, and teleportation.

trainingMethods.name: Strike Spells (e.g., Fire Strike on Cows)
itemsRequired: Runes for Fire Strike (Mind, Fire, Air)

trainingMethods.name: Curse Alching (Al Kharid Warriors)
trainingMethods.notes: Very AFK, low cost. Click warrior, cast curse, wait. Not for drops.

trainingMethods.name: High Level Alchemy
trainingMethods.notes: Classic money-making or cost-neutral training method. Can be done anywhere.

trainingMethods.name: Bursting/Barraging (Dust Devils/Nechryaels on Slayer Task)
trainingMethods.location: Smoke Dungeon, Catacombs of Kourend, Slayer Tower
trainingMethods.notes: Fastest Magic XP, especially on task. Expensive but effective.

trainingMethods.name: Plank Make (Lunar Spellbook)
trainingMethods.notes: Makes planks cheaper than sawmill but slower. Good for ironmen or profit.

trainingMethods.name: Stun-Alching
trainingMethods.notes: Click-intensive method combining Stun and High Alchemy for faster casting.
